thread.title: Peaceful relaxing luxury hotel in Paris
thread.title_full: Peaceful relaxing luxury hotel in Paris - Review of Hotel De Nell, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mbs5
title: Peaceful relaxing luxury hotel in Paris
text: We only spent one night at Hotel De Nell but it was lovely. The decor of our room was neutral and calming. We had a junior suite and it was very spacious with a cute balcony. Sheets and towels were soft. Bathroom had a cool tub even though we didn't use it. Comfortable bed. Good breakfast. Staff was friendly and helpful Thank you
